entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this morning and this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon.
